long_description: Spending time enjoying the great outdoors? Protect yourself from sun and bugs with the Buff UV Buff with Insect Shield(R). Wear the versatile piece as a scarf, bandanna or hair wrap. EPA-registered Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel fends off mosquitoes, ticks, ants, flies, chiggers and no-see-ums. Insect Shield(R) is effective through 70 washes. Highly breathable CoolMax(R) polyester draws sweat off the skin and dries quickly so you stay dry and comfortable. Built-in sun protection blocks 95% of UV radiation. Polygiene odor control treatment inhibits the growth of odor-causing bacteria to keep the Buff smelling fresh.
short_description: Spending time enjoying the great outdoors? Protect yourself from sun and bugs with the Buff UV Buff with Insect Shield(R). Wear the versatile piece as a scarf, bandanna or hair wrap.
